segments.text: Look at this headline - Elvis Baby Born on Spacecraft . Where do these tabloids get such crazy stories ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve often wondered the same thing . I also wonder who reads them . Then I realize that I ’ m standing here reading them myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks as though everyone in line reads them , or at least looks at the headlines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we picked the right line . This one seems to be moving more quickly than the others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe our checker is faster at scanning the food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m glad . We have only about twenty things here , and I ’ m in a hurry to get home .
segments.speaker: S2
